Text:
3li, do you know how i can add this subtitles into the mp4 file?

I use and apple tv / ipad 2. I did mux with yamb but itunes doesnt see the subtitle, vlc and other programs do.

Really shame cause i really need subtitles

nevermind i got it to work, used ultraedit to change it from text to sbtl.

now i have working subtitles in the movie, and it shows on the ipad / apple tv
excellent movie, excellent quality, excellent uploader, thank you! +1
